name: SuperHero Bike Stunt Racing Go
description:
Realistic environment has been designed for bike jumpers, moto bike stunts, tricky and crazy bike stunts, speed stunts, bang stunts at impossible tracks full of hurdles like footballs, cool flips etc. Smooth game play control will entertain all game lovers as well as they wanted while driving Super hero Bike Race .
• Choose your super hero ride one by one of Super power heavy race moto bike.
FEATURE :
- Multiple exciting top stunt tricky bikes & superhero
- Ability to perform high flying stunts & extreme speed stunts
- Realistic bike physics and working bike shocks
- Agile and fast reacting bike using accelerometer
- Eye-popping high definition graphics
- Best motocross free to play and top free bike games
• Enjoy jump stunt on stunt ramps.
